sqlMap.select:
select dn.id as id, approve_user, approve_result, approve_time, sender_name, sender_mail, sender_link, sender_time, read_times, support_times, content_points, content_points_times, publish_points, publish_points_times, p_id, discount_category, discount_area, discount_start, discount_end, news_source, news_title, news_review,name, short_name, website, email, log, reg_date, description from discount_news dn left join program_info pinfo on dn.p_id=pinfo.id
order by $orderByClause$
limit $limit$

select id, approve_user, approve_result, approve_time, sender_name, sender_mail, sender_link, sender_time, read_times, support_times, content_points, content_points_times, publish_points, publish_points_times, p_id, discount_category, discount_area, discount_start, discount_end, news_source, news_title, news_review, news_content,name, short_name, website, email, log, reg_date, description from discount_news where id = #id:BIGINT#
